Package Nerdle.Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Answer
    extension to the combination class including methods for generating and saving the daily answer.
    AnswerGenerator  
    Combination
    Class representing one equation consisting of multiple EquationCharacters.
    EquationCharacter
    Class representing one symbol of an equation and a color (used for marking it as correct, etc)
    HighScoreList
    used as collection of users for hioghscoresScreenView
    MVPModel  
    Nerdle
    Main class of the game, containing all elements of the game
    Overzicht
    Class containing all possible Operations+Numbers The colors are based on the previous guesses
    User
    A User plus methods for loading and saving scores
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Difficulty
    enum used to change the parameters of the game (comboLength and number of tries)
    EquationCharacter.CombinationColor
    enum representing the color of the EquationCharacter -> Correct, wrong place, wrong,not checked
    EquationCharacter.Operation  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NerdleException
